feed.title: Don‚Äôt Touch My Mushroom
feed.subtitle: "Don't Touch My Mushroom" is an improvisional theatre company that grows & performs in Zurich, Switzerland. Despite not having a single native speaker, we proudly perform in English with a wide variety accents and oddities.

entry.title: Mushrooms on Stage
entry.content:
Improv is what happens when the actors don‚Äôt know what will happen: A totally spontaneous spectacle, made up on the spot and based on suggestions from the audience members! You will not walk out smarter, but you will walk out happier!

‚Äì Donation based entry ‚Äì

Invite others through the Facebook event page!

entry.title: Wombats vs Mushrooms - Impro Battle
entry.content:
The prophecy says that in 2020 a new generation of improv show will emerge. Only the bravest improvisers will dare challenge the mighty Don‚Äôt Touch My Mushroom. In this first edition, the Wisdom of Wombats have answered the calling. Who will become the winner of the first Improv Battle?

‚Äì Donation based entry ‚Äì

Invite others through the Facebook event page!

entry.title: Mushroom Harvest
entry.content:
Improv is what happens when the actors don‚Äôt know what will happen: A totally spontaneous spectacle, made up on the spot and based on suggestions from the audience members!

Thanksgiving can be the land of any inspiration. Come for a fantastical time full of unexpected surprises. You give us suggestions and we create the story.

‚Äì Donation based entry ‚Äì

Invite others through the Facebook event page!

entry.title: IMPRO CH√ÑLLER presents Impro Match
entry.content:
Impro Match in English.

Join us in Improchaeller for a friendly impro contest between ‚ÄúBerta Pan‚Äùüç≥ and ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt Touch My Mushroom‚ÄùüçÑ. Crazy short forms will test their improv skills, make you laugh and wonder. You get to choose the winner!

Date: Wednesday 25 September 2019 Door opens at 19:00. Show starts at 19:30. Location: Dynamo, Zurich.

Invite others and more info on the facebook event page.

entry.title: Between 2 Worlds
entry.content:
Improv is what happens when the actors don‚Äôt know what will happen: A totally spontaneous spectacle, made up on the spot and based on suggestions from the audience members!

The gap between worlds will become narrow this night. Come for a fantastical time full of unexpected surprises. You put the suggestions and we create the story. This Summer‚Ä¶ Don‚Äôt Touch My Mushroom, in between worlds edition.

Invite others through the Facebook event page!

entry.title: Drawing Lines
entry.content:
19:30 Apero, 20:00 Start of the Performance

Improv is what happens when the actors don‚Äôt know what will happen: A totally spontaneous spectacle, made up on the spot and based on suggestions from the audience members!

Come and see the Mushrooms performing a new spectacle, based on Jenseits‚Äô monthly theme: drawing lines. You have probably drawn black lines on mushrooms in the past, when you grilled them on your barbecue, but how can they draw lines on stage? And how does it work in the nature? Can a morel tell a chanterelle ‚Äúhey chica, your last joke was really borderline, please stop that!‚Äù?

Hope to see you there, for laughter, fairy tails, and pig tales (or the other way around‚Ä¶ ) !

You will not walk out smarter, but you will walk out happier!

Performance is in English

Entry: recommended contribution is 15,- chf (includes also the finger food before the show)

Invite others through the Facebook event page!

entry.title: Making Sense of Senses
entry.content:
Making Sense of Senses

This show is based on jenseits‚Äô seasonal theme ‚Äúsense and senses.‚Äù Do mushrooms have a special sense to react and improvise on cue thrown at them? Can they smell what their fellows think? Come and discover how (un)believable stories are created in front of your eyes, based on your suggestions. All of this sprinkled with a variety of foreign accents!

Improv is what happens when the actors don‚Äôt know what will happen: A totally spontaneous spectacle, made up on the spot and based on suggestions from the audience members!

You will not walk out smarter, but you will walk out happier!

Time: 20:00 until ca. 21:30 Uhr

Entrance fee: pay what you want

Invite others through the Facebook event page!

entry.title: Where fungi feel at home‚Ä¶
entry.content:
Where fungi feel at home‚Ä¶

Join us to laugh with and at one of the few (and therefore one of the best!) Zurich‚Äôs international improv theatre troupes, Don‚Äôt Touch My Mushroom. Once again, the fungi‚Äôs show will be unscripted, unpredictable, unhinged, and inspired by you, the audience.

You will not walk out smarter, but you will walk out happier.

This show is based on jenseits‚Äô seasonal theme, ¬´Be at Home.¬ª Do you wonder what that means for a mushroom? No worries, the players also do not know! They will make sense of it and invent (un)believable stories in front of your eyes, helped by your suggestions and their random thoughts (if they have any). All of this sprinkled with a variety of foreign accents!

Time: 20:00 until ca. 21:30 Uhr

Entrance fee: pay what you want

Invite others through the Facebook event page!

entry.title: Improv Tales of 1001 Night
entry.content:
Improv Tales of 1001 Night!

Don‚Äôt Touch My Mushroom will be hosted on this occasion by our friends from Wisdom of Wombats. We will create improv scenes based on real-life tales of humour, tragedy, love, different kind of stories, new fairy tales, anything with a beginning, a middle and an end.

‚òõ Doors open 19:30, show starts at 20h.

‚òõ Location: LangKult, Langstrasse 113a.

‚òõ PWYW, This is a pay what you want event, a collection üé© will be passed around at the end of the show.

Invite others through the Facebook event page!

entry.title: Sporeadic Fungi Improv
entry.content:
Sporeadic Fungi Improv!

Join us to laugh with and at one of the few (and therefore one of the best!) Zurich‚Äôs international improv theatre troupe: The Don‚Äôt Touch my Mushroom team. Once again, the fungi‚Äôs show will be unscripted, unpredictable, unhinged, and inspired by you, the audience. You will not walk out smarter, but you will walk out happier. You might also learn some alternative facts created out of your suggestions and of the players‚Äô random neuron connections. All of this sprinkled with a variety of foreign accents!

The show is in English. Also see the jenseits event page.

Invite others through the Facebook event page!
